message: I understand you want a fair deal, but the declining value makes it important to act fast.  This offer compensates me for the shrinking pot.
Time is running out, and our money is losing value quickly. This offer is a good compromise to ensure we both benefit.
We're running out of time, let's be reasonable
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  We need to agree now before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
